titles.title: A bill to authorize reduced postage rates for certain mail matter sent to Members of Congress.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S560-561)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Authorizes individuals to use a special one-cent stamp to send any piece of mail not exceeding four ounces in weight to their Senators and Representatives in Congress.
